website_summaries.verdict: The feature-rich and highly customizable ComicCat makes reading DRM-free digital comics on Android devices a simple, enjoyable affair.
pros: Compatible with a wide variety of formats
Can sideload digital comics via an SD card

customer_reviews.title: Best comic reader i've used
customer_reviews.text: Best comic reader I've used on my tablet/phone. There are quite a few advanced settings that you might want to have a close look at and play with to get your own preferences for this app, some are a bit hidden away but having these advanced settings is amazing. I set the App to use my NAS server to sync the comics over and automatically download the new comics to the tablet which is something a lot of other apps miss, it's also possible to link to some cloud storage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Probably the perfect app
customer_reviews.text: Using kindle fire to read my comics has never been easier
customer_reviews.author: Marco D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and intuitive!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I had been using free comic book readers for a few years and my friend reccomended this one. It automatically scans my Kindle for supported formats and sorts comics into lots and alphabetical order. So simple to use. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ouija

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal app
customer_reviews.text: having used this app for a few months i cannot see myself ever returning to the free options that are available as they all lack something that i cannot quite place my finger on not so with this one its absolutely the best comic reader with a host of options,setting and choices sure some are hidden away but once you find and set them it gives the APP a whole new layer of use and reading topcow comics of the Kindle 8 HD has never been a better experience well worth the purchase and a review any one who buys this for their comic reading will never go back an absolutely phenomenal app
customer_reviews.author: Cerberus Shepard

customer_reviews.title: organises books , comics into shelves for easy viewing, like a library
customer_reviews.text: organises books , comics into shelves for easy viewing, like a library, brilliant. Easy viewing of comics, books, formats it converts xx
customer_reviews.author: Laila Scheinpflug

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic program
customer_reviews.text: An excellent program which I'm using to view my comic collection on a Fire HD. Extremely quick to load and much better than any other program I've used previously.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this app. Does the job and is instinctive to use. It has not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: Good comic reader
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and is easy to use. For the most part it works well but I have had a couple of issues. Sometimes it forgets which page I was last on. The page turning is also not always the most smooth and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for kiddle fire
customer_reviews.text: perfect for reading comics on kindle. I wish it opened ebooks as well. puts them in same order as on sd card, just need to adjust nest. Opens pdfs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Panom. W

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Great for reading comics on kindle IMO far better than comixology for reading comics on kindle. Had no problems and the clarity is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Shalako42

customer_reviews.title: This is the one...
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many of these readers, but this is far and away the best. The pinch-to-zoom and pan features work far more smoothly than any other out there, and the page-turn feature is intuitive and effective. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, easy to use. I can open .cbr files to read on my fire tablet
customer_reviews.author: David Swan

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of software
customer_reviews.text: I like the application itself however it doesn't register sub-directories more than 2 or 3 deep after that they are all listed alphabetically.
customer_reviews.author: AMPWS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! Nice and simple interface, didn't take any figuring out really. Would be nice to add sub folders to divide different series but have a feeling that's possible already
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Great app so easy to use and great features...love reading my comics on it..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Coates

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good app that does exactly what's needed. Very simple to use and effective. I was looking for ages for something that did exactly this. Very worth its low price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: APP mostly works BUT....
customer_reviews.text: the company website and email support are no longer functioning!
customer_reviews.author: Mr JLS

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this app. It seems a little complicated at first, but the filing system us intuitive and it gets easier very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: WindingWay

customer_reviews.title: Great app with only one thing missing
customer_reviews.text: Really great app that works brilliantly. Only suggestion would be the addition of custom made folders to make separating different comic series and characters a bit easier. Other than that, brilliant stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worth paying for. At least on this one I can read the comics I already own.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Gillies

customer_reviews.title: Great app for storing different file types
customer_reviews.text: Great app, well worth the money! I had a bunch of books in the wrong file type and this app saves them and organises them to be accessible and tidy. Perfect for my comics and pdfs
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much a perfect app. The only improvement I could think of would be a dynamic viewing mode similar to what comixology has.
customer_reviews.author: JBN-MusicShop

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I have been using this app for years and never had a problem. Simple interface and super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Waterton

customer_reviews.title: The best cbr reader for your kindle
customer_reviews.text: Just a great app that lets you catalogue and read your car files. Quick, easy to use, and with lots of great options.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful app!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Works brilliantly on kindle fire for comics and pdfs.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Weir

customer_reviews.title: Great comic reader
customer_reviews.text: Great comic reader, allows you to set settings just how you like . Best I have tried to date, would recommend as a reader to have

customer_reviews.title: Good but weird scrolling
customer_reviews.text: If you flick to scroll you are unable to interupt the scrolling which is rather annoying
customer_reviews.author: Tom Black

customer_reviews.title: not as good as comic zeal
customer_reviews.text: Messy and not as intuitive as comic zeal on the iPad but still can be worked. Messy integration with soapbox but it works after you figure it out

customer_reviews.title: best kindle app ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I use my kindle fire HD purely to read graphic novels. This app performs beautifully. It's easy to use, efficient and there's not much more you need to know. My favourite and permanently used app.
customer_reviews.author: HarbingerUK

customer_reviews.title: Readapalooza
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need it to do. You can read. Comics.

customer_reviews.title: really easy and fast to use
customer_reviews.text: really easy and fast to use, uploaded comics, and was able to read them almost immediately,nicely files all uploaded comics

customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app, worth the price and does everything you would expect!

customer_reviews.text: The app was a big surprise. Really happy with the organiser. Definitely recommended.

customer_reviews.text: Reliable, and has enough functionality to likely match any reading habits.

customer_reviews.text: Does what is says on the tin. Nice and clear and easy to navigate.

customer_reviews.title: great app
customer_reviews.text: With a bit of tweaking in settings this app is great for almost every comic I've read on it.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good display. Best comic refer I have ever used

customer_reviews.text: also has the function for reverse order reading (right to left) handy for some of the japanime which the best content usually is.

customer_reviews.text: Superb app. Love using it. Really simple to use. Would recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and user friendly interface. Excellent value for money, would recommend to all comic book fans.

customer_reviews.text: Tried a few of the others and none work as well as ComiCat. Easy to use and to manage your collection.

customer_reviews.title: great.

customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly on kindle fire,can't compare it to any other reader as after purchasing I never needed to try another.

customer_reviews.text: A nice app for ordering your scans, whether it be PDF, CBR or CBZ. Have had no problems as far. Immensely pleased, far superior to the alternatives on kindle fire.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliance
customer_reviews.text: Best app I've used yet and I've used umpteen thousand of them.

customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific app which has opened the door to me 're-reading comics from my youth. The colours and artistry is beautiful to see on the kindle and the app is very simple to use

customer_reviews.title: does everything it should
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Picks up any comic files on my kindle and let's me view them in a very easy to read format

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use app. Would have given it 5 stars had there been a bigger capacity.

customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, easy to use and allowed me to access the forgotten pleasure that is reading my favourite old comics.

customer_reviews.text: The last word in comic book apps - accept no substitutes.

customer_reviews.title: worth paying for
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The only thing it's really missing is an option to save pages from comics.

customer_reviews.title: very good app but...
customer_reviews.text: If you could stop page view from changing from fit width to fit height randomly when reading it would be a 5/5

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant app
customer_reviews.text: This app is perfect for my needs. It handles non-fiction and reference books as well as it handles comics. Photos in books are reproduced exceptionally well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Most apps I find myself changing eventually, due to hoping for something better. This is however the only comic book reader I've had, and can't see any reason to change that

customer_reviews.text: Clutter free and easy to use with extensive tools and preferences, I can not recommend this more highly. A great way to read your favourite comics.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very quick. Easy to move between comics and the ability to jump straight to the next is a nice feature.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and I don't have any problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anggoro T. Widyatmoko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome, easy to use, and now I have my comics books on hand wherever I go :) Great app.
customer_reviews.author: The-Winter-Hero

customer_reviews.title: Comicat review
customer_reviews.text: Great app, easy to copy cbr files from PC and sync to the App's library. Easy to use and excellent display.
customer_reviews.author: Robert 123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This app does exactly what it is supposed to, and it does it well. It opens .cbz and .cbr files which the kindle doesn't support unless you have this app. You are given lots of options to change settings to your preferences and it is very simple to use. If you have a digital comic collection that you want to read on your kindle, look no further. All you have to do is plug in your kindle to your computer, drag and drop your comics into the "documents" folder, then you can read them using this app which automatically searches for all compatible files. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MSmith

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.text: Good app for kindle fire. Only flaw. Puts comics numbered 100 and up with comics numbered 10 and on. Sequence goes: 8:9:10;101:102: Otherwise simple and well structured.
customer_reviews.author: paul evans

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This app is fantastic. Works so much better than the comic reader I have on my laptop. Using the kindle fire HD at the moment and this app works perfectly. Easy to use and catalogue. Works with all the main formats that you would get when using digital comics. Also looks fantastic in HD. Getting the Xperia tablet soon for more memory and use of ad cards but this will definitely be one of my first apps.
customer_reviews.author: Northenmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Comic reader
customer_reviews.text: The best one in my opinion you can get. defintly recommend it if you like reading comicbooks on your e-book reader or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Frederik

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stuff
customer_reviews.text: Recognises CBR format as well as a few other formats. Very easy to use, displays the comics well in both the menu screen and when reading them. A must for those who already have comics in CBR format.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: This app looks good and does a great job of presenting your collection. Easy to transfer and catalogue your comics, very versatile. Look no further...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic reader!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use great, interface nice to be able to organise into folders. Top job. Would definitely recommend!!!! An active pan and zoom would be good
customer_reviews.author: Malstark

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Every setting you need for managing a digital collection. I wasn't honestly expecting much from the app but have been totally surprised.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: best comic vewer available for android
customer_reviews.text: fast viewer and good library function if you have a large collection (the library or 'bookshelf' function handles collections that span more than one SD cards, which is a big bonus for the avid reader/collector/completist). Perfect on my 10 inch teclast tablet, and has also worked flawlessly on all my other devices... not one single crash in years, and I use this app all the time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ShammyB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Makes reading comics great! Supports so many types of ebook too - .cbr, PDF and more. Cannot recommend enough if you're looking for an app to read with.
customer_reviews.author: tiamaria

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: works really well on my kindle fire hd and the colours are vibrant! my only concern with the app is page turning isnt as smooth compared to kindle's reading software, but otherwise well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: nav

customer_reviews.title: Cracking app.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress how good this app is. It read my entire digital comics collection with nice, fluid controls. And presents them in a similar library format to most other popular news stands.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for Kindle-owning comic lovers
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. Great library set-up for easy browsing. Once you're done reading a comic, it gives you the option of either marking the comic as read or deleting it from your Kindle to make room for new stuff. Reading comics feels very natural with this interface. I'd been concerned th
customer_reviews.author: NRez

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant, uncluttered interface, fast to load and simple to use. Makes reading digital comics almost as fun as the real thing (for an oldie like me).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic app. The "bookshelf" your comics are stored in is visually pleasing and organising and browsing each issue is extremely easy and intuitive. The app has worked with every file format I've thrown at it and automatically scans your device for any existing comics. I previously used Perfect Viewer, but changed to Comicat aftet PV decided it needed a WiFi connection to open my comics. Bizzare. I've had no such issues with Comicat, brilliant app.
customer_reviews.author: N D

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: good app for reading comics on and has a good presentation/format for viewing and selecting. only down side could be a bit cheaper as its just a reader.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Best Comic App
customer_reviews.text: £2:49 it's not a lot for a great app if you have digital comics you can't go wrong with this. Bet you can't get better.
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: grand job
customer_reviews.text: great app, well worth the money. Presents your comics in an attractive and easy to read way. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great value app!
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased this app today but it is brilliant so far! The tablet and ComiCat beats reading comics on a laptop. As lush and easy to use as a material comic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great app, easy to use and keeps all my files in one handy place.
customer_reviews.author: daz cooksey

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: The best reader I have ever used, simple to use and keeps everything in neat sections. This reader convinced me to go almost completely digital after years of saying I never would. Has also kept the wife happy as now I don't have tons of books cluttering up the place. A must for any kindle owning comic book fan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mcknight
